rmimessenger.general

Interface IClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client

    public interface IClient
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This is a remote interface for illustrating RMI client callback.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command doResponse(Response r)
      This remote method is invoked by a callback server to make a callback to an client which implements this interface.
      CommandFactory getCommandFactory() 
      TextCommandFactory getTextFactory() 

    • Method Detail

      • doResponse

        Command doResponse(Response r)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This remote method is invoked by a callback server to make a callback to an client which implements this interface.
        Parameters:
        message - a string containing information for the client to process upon being called back.
        Returns:
        the Responsecommand
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
